backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping PWA, offline caching, install entry points, and CTA features to related files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of major frontend files including components, content modules, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with PWA meta tags, manifest link, icons, and root mounting point.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme colors, start URL, and maskable icons.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page with auto-reconnect logic and a retry button.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, cache cleanup, navigation fallback to offline.html, and cache‑first fetch handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wiring navigation, sections, scroll behavior, search index, and service worker registration.
frontend/src/components/BoostlyLink.tsx: Component showing the site URL with a copy‑to‑clipboard button and temporary success feedback.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a multi-column footer with brand info, resource links, social icons, and a copyright line.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Displays a hero section with headline, description, CTAs, and a large illustration image.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Provides a simple page layout wrapper with a full-height flex column container.
frontend/src/components/MarketingNav.tsx: Implements a responsive navigation bar with scrolling behavior, search integration, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/sections/BroadTo: Renders guidance cards for broad content topics using mapped data with tips, badges, and optional disclaimers.
frontend/src/components/sections/Content: Displays content-type guidance cards with descriptions, tips, categories, and optional disclaimers.
frontend/src/components/sections/CoreGro: Renders a section showing growth tip cards and actionable checklists using mapped content arrays.
frontend/src/components/sections/FaqSect: Displays a FAQ section with accordion items sourced from site content.
frontend/src/components/sections/GetBoos: Provides PWA install prompts and platform-specific installation instructions.
frontend/src/components/sections/Platfor: Shows platform-specific growth tips in tabbed cards using icon-labeled tabs.
frontend/src/components/sections/ToolsRe: Lists categorized tools and resources with icons, descriptions, and external links.
frontend/src/components/SiteSearch.tsx: Provides interactive search with query handling, keyboard navigation, and result selection UI.
Exports structured guidance items for broad content topics including metadata, disclaimers, and tips.
frontend/src/content/contentTypeGuidance: Defines the ContentTypeGuidanceItem interface and provides a static list of content-type guidance items with descriptions, keywords, and tips.
frontend/src/content/growthGuidance.ts: Defines GrowthTip and Checklist interfaces and exports static growth tips and checklists for profile and content strategy guidance.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Exports platform-specific tips and FAQs for search indexing using structured interfaces.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth handling with login, logout, status tracking, and a provider for app-wide identity access.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstall.ts: Manages PWA installation prompts, tracking installability and exposing an install function.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides a placeholder backend query hook that returns the current actor and fetch state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS layers, theme variables, dark mode styles, typography, and utility classes including highlight animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on window load and logs success or failure.
frontend/src/search/scrollAndHighlight.t: Provides smooth scrolling to a target element and applies a temporary highlight with focus handling.
frontend/src/search/searchIndex.ts: Builds a unified search index from various content sources and includes tokenization and relevance scoring for search queries.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, fonts, themes, animations, and plugin integration.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, features, and design notes for the Boostly app and website.
